name: Ratz V Aliens
description:
You are a rat and aliens from outer space have opened a portal onto generic street and are threatening to destroy the world! Upgrade turrets, collect items and stop the aliens from breaking into fort rat in this wave-based tower defense game.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move Player
  • Mouse: Move Camera
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot
  • E: Interact with interaction circles
  • ESC: Pause the game
